{{short description|2016 film}} {{Use dmy dates|date=April 2020}} {{Infobox film | name = Much Ado About Nothing | image = Much Ado About Nothing 2016 poster.jpg | caption = Film poster | director = [[Alejandro Fernández Almendras]] | producer = | writer = Alejandro Fernández Almendras | starring = Agustín Silva
[[Paulina García]]
[[Daniel Alcaíno]]
[[Alejandro Goic (actor)|Alejandro Goic]]
[[Luis Gnecco]]
Augusto Schuster | music = | cinematography = | editing = | distributor = | released = {{Film date|2016|1|23|[[2016 Sundance Film Festival|Sundance]]|2016|9|1|Chile|df=yes}} | runtime = 94 minutes | country = Chile | language = Spanish | budget = }} '''''Much Ado About Nothing''''' ({{lang-es|'''Aquí no ha pasado nada'''}}) is a 2016 Chilean [[drama film]] directed by [[Alejandro Fernández Almendras]]. It was shown in the Panorama section at the [[66th Berlin International Film Festival]].{{cite web |url=http://www.berlinale.de/en/presse/pressemitteilungen/alle/Alle-Detail_31573.html |title=Berlinale 2016: Panorama 2016 Complete |accessdate=23 January 2016 |work=Berlinale}} It was inspired by a real-life [[List of political scandals in Chile|political scandal]] in Chile. In 2013, Martín Larraín, son of Senator [[Carlos Larraín]] (then-president of the right-wing party [[National Renewal (Chile)|Renovación Nacional]]), was acquitted after killing a man in a [[DUI]] [[hit and run]] while his friends took the fall.{{cite web|url=https://variety.com/2016/film/reviews/much-ado-about-nothing-film-review-1201705940/|title=Film Review: ‘Much Ado About Nothing’|first=Peter|last=Debruge|date=14 February 2016|publisher=|accessdate=17 December 2016}} ==Cast== * Agustín Silva as Vicente * [[Paulina García]] * [[Daniel Alcaíno]] * [[Alejandro Goic (actor)|Alejandro Goic]] * [[Luis Gnecco]] * Samuel Landea * Dindi Jane * Isabella Costa * [[Augusto Schuster]] ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== * {{IMDb title|4650738|Much Ado About Nothing}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Much Ado About Nothing}} [[Category:2016 films]] [[Category:2016 drama films]] [[Category:Chilean films]] [[Category:Chilean drama films]] [[Category:Spanish-language films]] [[Category:Drama films based on actual events]] [[Category:Films about miscarriage of justice]] {{Chile-film-stub}} {{2010s-drama-film-stub}}
